items.sentence: I know you and I are going to get along together fine.
I live within spitting distance of the subway station.
I hope I\'m not the only one who\'s going to be there.
You know things are bad when they call Tom in to help.
I tried to open the door, but couldn\'t get it opened.
I spent my summer vacation traveling around Australia.
I stayed at an inexpensive hotel when I was in Boston.
I talked to Tom and Mary while I was waiting for John.
It might be too late for us to do anything about that.
It probably would be dangerous to do that by yourself.
It seems Tom and I are the only ones here from Boston.
You\'re just trying to shift blame away from yourself.
You\'re one of the only people who knows where Tom is.
I didn\'t know what we were doing was against the law.
I didn\'t think that it would be that easy to do that.
I didn\'t want to leave before the work was completed.
I didn\'t want to sing, but Tom asked me to, so I did.
Tom could see that Mary was about to burst into tears.
Let\'s find out what time we\'re supposed to be there.
Tom picked up the coffee pot and poured himself a cup.
Tom plans to swim as soon as he finishes his homework.
Put the box wherever you can find room for it, please.
I\'d rather have a full-time job than a part-time one.
Tom didn\'t want to make the same mistake as Mary did.
Tom is the type of a person who calls a spade a spade.
Tom ought to tell Mary all about what he and John did.
Tom picked an apple from the tree and handed it to me.
Tom has two cats. One is white and the other is black.
Are you saying that you don\'t want to see me anymore?
Australia is the world\'s fifth-largest coal producer.
Didn\'t you know Tom saw you in the park this morning?
Tom noticed Mary was a few inches shorter than he was.
Tom left this morning without finishing his breakfast.
Tom asked Mary if he could borrow her French textbook.
Tom asked Mary what kind of movies she liked to watch.
Tom asked if I wanted to go to a party and I said yes.
Tom stripped off his clothes and got into the bathtub.
It\'s been a long time since I visited my grandmother.
Tom says he\'s dated three different women named Mary.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t really care what happens.
Tom advised Mary not to eat anything that John cooked.
Tom always carries a camera with him wherever he goes.
Tom always waits until the last minute to do anything.
Tom always wears goggles when he rides his motorcycle.
Tom and I are just going to take it easy this weekend.
Tom forgot his wedding anniversary and Mary was upset.
Tom found Mary lying unconscious on the kitchen floor.
Tom found it difficult to keep the conversation going.
Let me read the newspaper if you\'ve finished with it.
Mary is always saying that Tom isn\'t romantic enough.
